Goal

The Paris Agreement in France was meant to promote the global clomate change response by increasing the ability of all to adapt adverse effects of climate change and foster climate resilience. The mission is

  • to enhance resilience
  • to minimize vulnerability so as to achieve sustainable development
  • to formulate adequate adaptive response in comating global warming

Planning and implentation

The agreement necessiatae all stakeholdersto take part in adaptation planning and implementation through

  • The national adaptation plan
  • Vulnerability and needs assessment
  • Monitoring and Evaluation
  • Economic diversification

Transparency

The agreement will improve the understanding of climate change and transparencyof actions by establishing a new framework that should provide information related to climate change impacts and adaptation
